comment._content: Cecil Paoli and Thomas Scott Baldwin are both mentioned in this NYTimes article about a Times airplane derby: (Oct 3, 1913). query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9A03E1DF133FE6... Click on Baldwin tag to learn more about him. The name of Robert Fowler turns up as an aviator in several NYTimes stories of the era. Here is a story of how he flew across the US in a Wright Bros plane (took him over 35 days of flying): select.nytimes.com/mem/archive/pdf?res=F40F10FF3955167A93...
